Name: Dream Clovers
About the game: About This Content Welcome to VR job experience! 'Dream Clovers' is an educative game application supporting VR-based job experience contents. Recently there are two contents, firefighter and astronaut. More contents will be registered soon. From the initial game title, you can choose what content to enter - job simulating contents or lobby. You can play some job simulating contents (firefighter, astronaut) and enjoy them completing each mission given. You can also enter into Dream Clovers lobby and see beautiful scenary, but currently some features (such as multiplay) is temporarily blocked. Controls The default controller of Meta Quest 2 (Oculus Quest 2) is used. Details would be explained in contents. Caution This content requires Meta Quest 2 (Oculus Quest 2) devices. This content requires SteamVR software. This content includes contents triggering health issues such as epilepsy and severe motion sickness for sensitive players. If you experience health anomally during using the application, please quit application immediately and take enough rest. System Requirements (Recommended) OS : Windows 10 Memory : 16GB Graphic card : NVIDIA GeForce 30 Series Internet speed : > 300Mbps
Meta Title: Dream Clovers: Nov 23, 2022, Do Dream and Full Overview
